title: Little Devil Teemo Icon
body: Hi, I still haven't won a single Doom Bots game and my question is if I will win a Doom Bots game today, can I still get the icon? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: The event was extended until the end of today per the [announcement](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/y7KEaVOp-doom-bots-of-doom-re-enabled-until-113).  If you haven't won a game yet for an icon, this it the time to do it.  Good luck!
